title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using Build 20011106, with a .java file open in the editor, clicking the new class button does not populate the 'Enclosing Type' field. It remains blank.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the current type in the editor when clicking the new class button.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a .java file in the editor using Build 20011106. 2. Click the new class button. 3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field, which should be blank instead of being populated with the current type in the editor.
